segments.text: What's the specialty of your restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The crab soup is quite delicious.It ' s always a favorite with our customers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I don't like seafood quite well . Would you suggest some others ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , why not try Spaghetti Bolognese ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I will follow your advice .
segments.speaker: S1
